name: Gate of the Great Old Ones
name_original: Gate of the Great Old Ones
description:
You play a hero who wakes up in a dark dungeon. Explore the environment and complete the various endings to piece together the history and future of this place.

Credits

This game was developed by Weichu (Bill) Cao and myself
